```python
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Data
genres = ['Hodegetria', 'allegory', 'figure painting', 'genre art', 'history painting', 'interior view', 'mythological painting', 'nude', 'portrait', 'religious art']
counts = [1, 3, 3, 1, 10, 1, 4, 8, 16, 54]

# Plot
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.bar(genres, counts, color='skyblue')
plt.xlabel('Genre')
plt.ylabel('Number of Paintings')
plt.title('Number of Paintings by Genre')
plt.xticks(rotation=45, ha='right')
plt.tight_layout()

# Save the plot
plt.savefig('/home/bleon/git/XMODE/ArtWork/experiments/log-batch/openai-gpt-4o/20251209-045713-r001/paintings_by_genre.png')
plt.close()
```
